welcome_message_body: Welcome to Reggio di Calabria, where ancient history and stunning beaches meet. Enjoy the city's charming atmosphere, delicious cuisine, and rich cultural heritage as you explore all it has to offer. Buon viaggio!

restaurants.address: Corso Vittorio Emanuele III 29/31 (Via Marina alta), Reggio Calabria Calabria
